xxl.spatial
Class FixedPointRectangle

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--xxl.spatial.FixedPointRectangle
public class FixedPointRectangle
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Convertable, ConvertableDescriptor

A Rectangle that uses an internal fixed-point representation. This means, no exponent is saved. The mantisse is 63 bits long.

read

public void read(DataInput dataInput)
          throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Convertable
Reads the state (the attributes) for an object of this class from the specified data input and restores the calling object. The state of the object before calling read will be lost.
The read method must read the values in the same sequence and with the same types as were written by write.
Specified by:
read in interface Convertable
Tags copied from interface: Convertable
Parameters:

numberOfSplitsPerLevel

protected int numberOfSplitsPerLevel(int bitIndex)
Computes the number of splits for a given level (i.e. bitIndex). Note, that this method will only work if this FixedPointRectangle was already split for bits [62,...,bitIndex-1]. This means, this method can be called when the next dimension to be considered is dimension 0.
Parameters:
bitIndex - bit-index (in [0,...,62])
dimensions - number of dimensions that are to be checked
Returns:
number of splits that will occur

toRectangle

protected Rectangle toRectangle()
Returns a Rectangle (double-representation).
